verses.verse: Gather yourselves together <WH7197>, yea <WH7197>, gather together, O nation <WH1471> that hath no shame <WH3700>;

before the decree <WH2706> bring forth <WH3205>, before the day <WH3117> pass <WH5674> as the chaff <WH4671>, before <WH3808> the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of Jehovah <WH3068> come <WH935> upon you <WH3117>, before the day of Jehovah <WH3068>'s anger <WH639> come upon you <WH935>.

Seek <WH1245> ye Jehovah <WH3068>, all ye meek <WH6035> of the earth <WH776>, that have kept <WH6466> his ordinances <WH4941>; seek <WH1245> righteousness <WH6664>, seek <WH1245> meekness <WH6038>: it may be <WH194> ye will be hid <WH5641> in the day <WH3117> of Jehovah <WH3068>'s anger <WH639>.

For Gaza <WH5804> shall be forsaken <WH5800>, and Ashkelon <WH831> a desolation <WH8077>; they shall drive out <WH1644> Ashdod <WH795> at noonday <WH6672>, and Ekron <WH6138> shall be rooted up <WH6131>.

Woe <WH1945> unto the inhabitants <WH3427> of the sea-coast <WH1471>, the nation of the Cherethites <WH3774>! The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> is against you <WH3667>, O Canaan, the land <WH776> of the Philistines <WH6430>; I will destroy <WH6> thee <WH3427>, that there shall be no inhabitant.
And the sea <WH3220> - coast <WH2256> shall be pastures <WH5116>, with cottages <WH3741> for shepherds <WH7462> and folds <WH1448> for flocks <WH6629>.

And the coast <WH2256> shall be for the remnant <WH7611> of the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063>; they shall feed <WH7462> their flocks thereupon <WH1004>; in the houses of Ashkelon <WH831> shall they lie down <WH7257> in the evening <WH6153>; for Jehovah <WH3068> their God <WH430> will visit <WH6485> them <WH7725>, and bring back their captivity <WH7622>.

I have heard <WH8085> the reproach <WH2781> of Moab <WH4124>, and the revilings <WH1421> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, wherewith they have reproached <WH2778> my people <WH5971>, and magnified <WH1431> themselves against their border <WH1366>.

Therefore as I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, Surely Moab <WH4124> shall be as Sodom <WH5467>, and the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> as Gomorrah <WH6017>, a possession <WH4476> of nettles <WH2738>, and saltpits <WH4379>, and a perpetual <WH5704> desolation <WH8077>: the residue <WH7611> of my people <WH5971> shall make a prey <WH962> of them <WH3499>, and the remnant of my nation <WH1471> shall inherit them <WH5157>.
This shall they have for their pride <WH1347>, because they have reproached <WH2778> and magnified <WH1431> themselves against the people <WH5971> of Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will be terrible <WH3372> unto them <WH7329>; for he will famish all the gods <WH430> of the earth <WH776>; and men shall worship <WH7812> him <WH376>, every one from his place <WH4725>, even all the isles <WH339> of the nations <WH1471>.
Ye Ethiopians <WH3569> also <WH1992>, ye shall be slain <WH2491> by my sword <WH2719>.

And he will stretch out <WH5186> his hand <WH3027> against the north <WH6828>, and destroy <WH6> Assyria <WH804>, and will make <WH7760> Nineveh <WH5210> a desolation <WH8077>, and dry <WH6723> like the wilderness <WH4057>.

And herds <WH5739> shall lie down <WH7257> in the midst <WH8432> of her <WH2416>, all the beasts of the nations <WH1471>: both the pelican <WH6893> and the porcupine <WH7090> shall lodge <WH3885> in the capitals <WH3730> thereof <WH6963>; their voice shall sing <WH7891> in the windows <WH2474>; desolation <WH2721> shall be in the thresholds <WH5592>: for he hath laid bare <WH6168> the cedar-work <WH731>.

This is the joyous <WH5947> city <WH5892> that dwelt <WH3427> carelessly <WH983>, that said <WH559> in her heart <WH3824>, I am <WH657>, and there is none besides me <WH8047>: how is she become a desolation, a place for beasts <WH2416> to lie down in <WH4769>! every one that passeth by <WH5674> her shall hiss <WH8319>, and wag <WH5128> his hand <WH3027>.
